name: Rhythm Prism 3
description:
Rhythm Prism 3 Overview

This extraordinary rhythm game [literally] has it all. Fight your way through monsters using the power of music and slay the beats in a neverending game of speed and accuracy!

Features
  • (?) = Coming Soon
  • Campaign mode (for real this time)
  • Customizable profile card (?)
  • Dynamic lightshows
  • Leaderboards (?)
  • Mods
  • New camera features
  • New environmental systems
  • New note transition effects
  • News (?)
  • Noteskins (?)
  • Shop
Controls
  • When a note appears, press the corresponding keys to catch a note.
  • For long notes, press ‘space.’
  • To pause, press ‘p.’
  • Look carefully at the notes when the camera zooms in.
  • Pausing will not work properly unless playing on TurboWarp (more information below).
  • In campaign mode, use the arrow keys or ‘wasd’ to navigate the map.
  • Wear wired headphones for the best experience.

* Do not use Bluetooth headphones when playing this game, it will be out of sync the whole time.

Notes

This is my last attempt at rhythm game (unless for some reason I’m foolish enough to start another). I tried to make it as polished as possible. No, not my last GAME, my last attempt at a RHYTHM game. THIS IS NOT MY LAST GAME. Anyway, enjoy!

Stuff you MUST know

It sometimes takes a while to load the score in the result screen, although it should not take a while at all (DARN YOU BUGS!). If that happens, enable Turbo Mode (Shift+Click Green Flag) and disable it when the results finally load. Also, this game was made solely for the purpose of entertainment, not to infringe anyone’ rights. And again, THIS IS NOT MY LAST GAME.
